aasimar.name: Aasimar
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Celestial Resistance - Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
Healing Hands - Touch a creature to heal HP equal to your level (once per long rest)
Light Bearer - You know the Light cantrip

subraces.name: Protector Aasimar
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Celestial Resistance - Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
Healing Hands - Touch a creature to heal HP equal to your level (once per long rest)
Light Bearer - You know the Light cantrip
Radiant Soul - Once per long rest, unleash divine energy for 1 minute. You can fly with 30 ft speed and deal extra radiant damage equal to your level once per turn

subraces.name: Scourge Aasimar
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Celestial Resistance - Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
Healing Hands - Touch a creature to heal HP equal to your level (once per long rest)
Light Bearer - You know the Light cantrip
Radiant Consumption - Once per long rest, radiate intense light for 1 minute. You deal radiant damage equal to half your level to yourself and enemies within 10 ft at start of your turns

subraces.name: Fallen Aasimar
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Celestial Resistance - Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
Healing Hands - Touch a creature to heal HP equal to your level (once per long rest)
Light Bearer - You know the Light cantrip
Necrotic Shroud - Once per long rest, unleash divine energy for 1 minute. Creatures within 10 ft must make CHA save or be frightened. Deal extra necrotic damage equal to your level once per turn

dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Choose dragon type for breath weapon and damage resistance
Breath Weapon - Exhale destructive energy (2d6 damage at level 1)
Damage Resistance - Resistance to damage type of your draconic ancestry

subraces.name: Black Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Black Dragon (Acid)
Breath Weapon - 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), Acid damage
Damage Resistance - Acid

subraces.name: Blue Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Blue Dragon (Lightning)
Breath Weapon - 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), Lightning damage
Damage Resistance - Lightning

subraces.name: Brass Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Brass Dragon (Fire)
Breath Weapon - 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), Fire damage
Damage Resistance - Fire

subraces.name: Bronze Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Bronze Dragon (Lightning)
Breath Weapon - 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), Lightning damage
Damage Resistance - Lightning

subraces.name: Copper Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Copper Dragon (Acid)
Breath Weapon - 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), Acid damage
Damage Resistance - Acid

subraces.name: Gold Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Gold Dragon (Fire)
Breath Weapon - 15 ft. cone (Dex. save), Fire damage
Damage Resistance - Fire

subraces.name: Green Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Green Dragon (Poison)
Breath Weapon - 15 ft. cone (Con. save), Poison damage
Damage Resistance - Poison

subraces.name: Red Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Red Dragon (Fire)
Breath Weapon - 15 ft. cone (Dex. save), Fire damage
Damage Resistance - Fire

subraces.name: Silver Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - Silver Dragon (Cold)
Breath Weapon - 15 ft. cone (Con. save), Cold damage
Damage Resistance - Cold

subraces.name: White Dragonborn
traits: Draconic Ancestry - White Dragon (Cold)
Breath Weapon - 15 ft. cone (Con. save), Cold damage
Damage Resistance - Cold

dwarf.name: Dwarf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Dwarven Resilience - Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage
Dwarven Combat Training - You have proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, light hammers, and warhammers
Tool Proficiency - Proficiency with one artisan's tool
Stonecunning - Add double proficiency bonus on History checks for stonework

subraces.name: Mountain Dwarf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Dwarven Resilience - Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage
Dwarven Combat Training - You have proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, light hammers, and warhammers
Tool Proficiency - Proficiency with one artisan's tool
Stonecunning - Add double proficiency bonus on History checks for stonework
Dwarven Armor Training - Proficiency with light and medium armor

subraces.name: Hill Dwarf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Dwarven Resilience - Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage
Dwarven Combat Training - You have proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, light hammers, and warhammers
Tool Proficiency - Proficiency with one artisan's tool
Stonecunning - Add double proficiency bonus on History checks for stonework
Dwarven Toughness - Hit point maximum increases by 1 per level

elf.name: Elf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Keen Senses - Proficiency in Perception
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Trance - During a long rest, you meditate for 4 hours, rather than sleeping for 8 hours

subraces.name: High Elf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Keen Senses - Proficiency in Perception
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Trance - During a long rest, you meditate for 4 hours, rather than sleeping for 8 hours
Elf Weapon Training - Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow
Cantrip - Know one cantrip from wizard spell list
Extra Language - Learn one extra language

subraces.name: Wood Elf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Keen Senses - Proficiency in Perception
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Trance - During a long rest, you meditate for 4 hours, rather than sleeping for 8 hours
Elf Weapon Training - Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow
Fleet of Foot - Base walking speed increases to 35 feet
Mask of the Wild - Can attempt to hide in light foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist

subraces.name: Dark Elf (Drow)
traits: Superior Darkvision (120 ft)
Keen Senses - Proficiency in Perception
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Trance - During a long rest, you meditate for 4 hours, rather than sleeping for 8 hours
Sunlight Sensitivity - Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in sunlight
Drow Magic - Know Dancing Lights cantrip, Faerie Fire and Darkness spells at higher levels
Drow Weapon Training - Proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, hand crossbows

firbolg.name: Firbolg
traits: Firbolg Magic - Cast Detect Magic and Disguise Self once per short rest
Hidden Step - Bonus action to turn invisible until start of your next turn (once per short rest)
Powerful Build - Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/drag/lift
Speech of Beast and Leaf - Can communicate simple ideas with beasts and plants

genasi.name: Genasi
traits: Elemental heritage - Choose your elemental subrace

subraces.name: Air Genasi
traits: Unending Breath - You can hold your breath indefinitely
Mingle with the Wind - Cast Levitate spell once per long rest (starting at 5th level)

subraces.name: Earth Genasi
traits: Earth Walk - Move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without extra movement
Merge with Stone - Cast Pass Without Trace once per long rest (starting at 5th level)

subraces.name: Fire Genasi
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fire Resistance - Resistance to fire damage
Reach to the Blaze - Know Produce Flame cantrip, cast Burning Hands once per long rest (starting at 3rd level)

subraces.name: Water Genasi
traits: Acid Resistance - Resistance to acid damage
Amphibious - You can breathe air and water
Swim - You have a swimming speed of 30 feet
Call to the Wave - Know Shape Water cantrip, cast Create or Destroy Water once per long rest (starting at 3rd level)

goliath.name: Goliath
traits: Natural Athlete - Proficiency in Athletics skill
Stone's Endurance - Reaction to reduce damage by 1d12 + CON modifier (once per short rest)
Powerful Build - Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/drag/lift
Mountain Born - Resistance to cold damage, acclimated to high altitude

half-elf.name: Half-Elf
languages: One extra language of your choice
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Skill Versatility - Proficiency in two skills of your choice

subraces.name: Standard Half-Elf
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Skill Versatility - Proficiency in two skills of your choice

subraces.name: High Elf Descent
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Elf Weapon Training - Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow
Cantrip - Know one cantrip from wizard spell list

subraces.name: Wood Elf Descent
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Elf Weapon Training - Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow
Fleet of Foot - Base walking speed increases to 35 feet
Mask of the Wild - Can attempt to hide in light foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist

subraces.name: Drow Descent
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Fey Ancestry - Advantage on saves against being charmed, magic can't put you to sleep
Drow Magic - Know Dancing Lights cantrip

half-orc.name: Half-Orc
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Menacing - Proficiency in Intimidation skill
Relentless Endurance - Drop to 1 HP instead of 0 once per long rest
Savage Attacks - Roll one extra weapon damage die on critical hits

halfling.name: Halfling
traits: Lucky - Reroll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
Brave - Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness - You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
traits: Lucky - Reroll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
Brave - Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness - You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours
Naturally Stealthy - Can hide when obscured by a creature one size larger

subraces.name: Stout Halfling
traits: Lucky - Reroll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws
Brave - Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness - You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours
Stout Resilience - Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage

human.name: Human
languages: One extra language of your choice
traits: Choose Standard Human or Variant Human

subraces.name: Standard Human
traits: Versatile - Gain +1 to all ability scores
Extra Language - You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice

subraces.name: Variant Human
traits: Ability Score Increase - +1 to two different ability scores of your choice
Skills - Proficiency in one skill of your choice
Feat - You gain one feat of your choice
Extra Language - You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice

tabaxi.name: Tabaxi
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Feline Agility - Double your speed until end of turn when you move (can't use again until you move 0 feet on a turn)
Cat's Claws - Your claws are natural weapons dealing 1d4 + STR slashing damage. Climbing speed of 20 feet
Cat's Talent - Proficiency in Perception and Stealth skills

tiefling.name: Tiefling
traits: Darkvision (60 ft)
Hellish Resistance - Resistance to fire damage
Infernal Legacy - Know Thaumaturgy cantrip, cast Hellish Rebuke and Darkness at higher levels

warforged.name: Warforged
traits: Constructed Resilience - Advantage on saves against poison, resistance to poison damage, immune to disease, doesn't need to eat/drink/breathe, doesn't need to sleep
Sentry's Rest - When you take a long rest, you spend 6 hours in an inactive state rather than sleeping
Integrated Protection - Your body has built-in defensive layers. Base AC is 11 + DEX modifier and you can use a shield
Specialized Design - You gain one skill proficiency and one tool proficiency of your choice
